data.name: Friends of little Yus
data.detailed_description:
Friends of Little Yus is a speedrunning game, challenge your friends to get to the flag as fast as possible. But be aware, there are obstacles which would like to have a word with you. Find the quickest path and get yourself into the top 10.

This singleplayer game is currently in alpha state, we will keep on developing and have big plans to add multiplayer support in the future. The current version of the game has a single map for you to play, more maps will be added in the future as well. Players can view the scores using the built-in leaderboard system, this way you can see which players are the fastest.

data.short_description: Friends of little Yus is a game about being the fastest. Get to the flag as fast as possible!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
